amendment.description: Amendment sought to postpone the bill from going into effect until the DOI, in consultation with the DOL, certifies that the offshore energy moratorium in the bill would not eliminate a substantial number of minority and women jobs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-200 to allow the bill to go into effect when DOI, in consultation with DOL, certifies that the offshore energy moratorium in the bill will not eliminate a substantial number of minority and women jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A003) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 251 (Roll no. 520).

action.text: Gosar amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A003) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 251 (Roll no. 520).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Gosar.
